comments:
Importing an EMF meta model in extend and check files is not functioning deterministic in the editors. Sometimes the model elements are found, often not. Making a dummy modification in the extend or check file and save it sometimes corrects the problem.
This is only functioning, when you before close all files, open the xtext file and after this open the ext file and save it.
It seems only be a problem of the editors, running the workflows seem to work.

Hope it helps a little bit to find the problem.

It seems that sometimes something hangs during rebuild/opening an expand/check file. Then I have to cancel the rebuild in eclipse. I got this stack trace in the eclipse error log:
